synopsis.text: Department's Fire Academy, Daigo Toake, a gifted rookie, outshines his peers with his exceptional skills and unwavering resolve. Despite feeling envious, Shun Onoda acknowledges Daigo's talent and aspires to work alongside him to save lives. Meanwhile, Yuki Nakamura, the sole female recruit, refuses to be overshadowed in this male-dominated field. As these three determined firefighters strive to join the elite 'Orange' rescue team, a national crisis begins to unfold, threatening the entire country. United by their shared goal, they must confront the challenges ahead and prove their worth as heroes in orange. Will they rise to the occasion and save Japan from impending doom?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
